name: Forest Crush
description:
In this game you play a heroic lady character who meets lovely woman in the forest. Unfortunately, this woman steals the only thing that can save your people - rainbow sphere. Who is this woman and why is she after the sphere? You need to find your way through different obstacles to find answers and get the sphere.

Heta - Designer & Artist
Riku - Programmer
Jesse - Programmer

The game was made during "Pride Game Jam HKI 2022" on the weekend of 30.6.-3.7.2022.
